headline: Is Now the Right Moment for Equinix After a 16.8% Drop in 2025?
summary: Curious if Equinix is truly worth its hefty price tag? You're not alone, and there's a lot beneath the surface when it comes to understanding its value. After a multi-year runup, Equinix's stock has pulled back recently, with a -4.8% return over the last week and a -16.8% drop year-to-date. This has made some investors question whether current prices reflect its real growth prospects or increasing risks. Recent headlines have focused on the data center giant’s expanding infrastructure...

headline: Finland's Big Idea: Turning Data Center Heat Into Power
summary: As AI and data centers consume more power worldwide, Finland is finding a way to turn the problem into a solution. Tom Mackenzie reports from Helsinki, where energy company Helen captures excess heat from Equinix's data centers and reuses it to warm local homes, cutting emissions and costs at once. With Microsoft and others now expanding similar projects, Finland's model could redefine what it means to build a sustainable digital economy.
